languages.text: "Неужели? А мне известно, что юноша души не чает в дщери иного семейства. Не уверена, впрочем, что родителям его выбор придется по душе!"

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Диалог о слухах и сплетнях продолжается

languages.text: "Is that right? Why, I have heard that the young man is mad about the daughter of another family entirely. But I am not so sure if his parents will approve of his choice!"
languages.original_text: "Неужели? А мне известно, что юноша души не чает в дщери иного семейства. Не уверена, впрочем, что родителям его выбор придется по душе!"

traits.locale_text: "Is that right? Why, I have heard that the young man is mad about the daughter of a certain other family. But I am not so sure if the parents will approve of his choice!"
"Is that right? Why, I have heard that the young man is mad about the daughter of a certain other family. But I am not so sure if the parents will approve of his choice!"
"Is that right? Why, I have heard that the young man is mad about the daughter of another family entirely. But I am not so sure if his parents will approve of his choice!"
"Is that right? Why, I have heard that the young man is mad about the daughter of another family entirely. But I am not so sure if his parents will approve of his choice!"
"Is that right? Why, I have heard that the young man is mad about the daughter of another family entirely. But I am not so sure if his parents will approve of his choice!"

languages.text: “是这样吗？我倒是听说，那个年轻人被另一个家族的女儿迷得神魂颠倒，但我不太确定他的父母会不会认可他的选择！”
languages.original_text: "Is that right? Why, I have heard that the young man is mad about the daughter of another family entirely. But I am not so sure if his parents will approve of his choice!"

traits.locale_text: “是这样吗？我倒是听说，那个年轻人被另一个家族的女儿迷得神魂颠倒，但我不太确定他的父母会不会认可他的选择！”

languages.text: «¿De verdad? Pues yo tengo entendido que el joven está loquito por la hija de otra familia. ¡Pero parece que sus padres no aprueban la decisión!».
languages.original_text: "Is that right? Why, I have heard that the young man is mad about the daughter of another family entirely. But I am not so sure if his parents will approve of his choice!"

traits.locale_text: «¿De verdad? Pues yo tengo entendido que el joven está loquito por la hija de otra familia. ¡Pero parece que sus padres no aprueban la decisión!».

languages.text: 「まあ、そうなの？あいつは別の一家の娘にぞっこんだって聞いたんだけど。まあ、彼の親が許すとも思えないけどね！」
languages.original_text: "Is that right? Why, I have heard that the young man is mad about the daughter of another family entirely. But I am not so sure if his parents will approve of his choice!"

traits.locale_text: 「まあ、そうなの？あいつは別の一家の娘にぞっこんだって聞いたんだけど。まあ、彼の親が許すとも思えないけどね！」

languages.text: "Tatsächlich? Ich habe gehört, der junge Mann sei ganz verrückt nach der Tochter einer gänzlich anderen Familie. Aber ich bin nicht sicher, ob seine Eltern seine Wahl billigen werden!"
languages.original_text: "Is that right? Why, I have heard that the young man is mad about the daughter of another family entirely. But I am not so sure if his parents will approve of his choice!"

traits.locale_text: "Tatsächlich? Ich habe gehört, der junge Mann sei ganz verrückt nach der Tochter einer gänzlich anderen Familie. Aber ich bin nicht sicher, ob seine Eltern seine Wahl billigen werden!"

languages.text: « Vraiment ? J'ai pourtant cru comprendre que le jeune homme était fortement épris d'une demoiselle issue d'une autre famille. Bien que je doute que ses parents approuvent son choix ! »
languages.original_text: "Is that right? Why, I have heard that the young man is mad about the daughter of another family entirely. But I am not so sure if his parents will approve of his choice!"

traits.locale_text: « Vraiment ? J'ai pourtant cru comprendre que le jeune homme était fortement épris d'une demoiselle issue d'une autre famille. Bien que je doute que ses parents approuvent son choix ! »

languages.text: "Öyle mi dersin? Ben bilakis delikanlının tamamen farklı bir ailenin kızına deli olduğunu duydum. Tabii ebeveynleri bu seçimini onaylar mı, işte ondan pek emin değilim!"
languages.original_text: "Is that right? Why, I have heard that the young man is mad about the daughter of another family entirely. But I am not so sure if his parents will approve of his choice!"

traits.locale_text: "Öyle mi dersin? Ben bilakis genç adamın tamamen farklı bir ailenin kızı için deli olduğunu duydum ama ebeveynleri onun bu seçimini onaylar mı, ondan pek emin değilim!"
